show.title: Beauty's Formula
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/VY3QnL
show.description: When aging actress Reshma makes a deal with a mysterious masked figure for eternal youth, she becomes entangled in a sinister conspiracy involving missing women, dark experiments, and a dangerous cult, while her abandoned son Surya searches for his missing fiancée who may be connected to it all.
show.description_secondary: When aging actress Reshma makes a deal with a mysterious masked figure for eternal youth, she becomes entangled in a sinister conspiracy involving missing women, dark experiments, and a dangerous cult, while her abandoned son Surya searches for his missing fiancée who may be connected to it all.
